items.sentence: How long do you think the jury will take before they reach a verdict?
She intended to go shopping with her mother, but her mother was busy.
Some flowers bloom in the spring and other flowers bloom in the fall.
Mary put some flowers in the vase and then put the vase on the table.
If you\'re going to go to France, you should brush up on your French.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t likely be able to convince Mary to help him.
Tom may understand French fairly well, but doesn\'t speak it so well.
Tom didn\'t have enough time to do everything that needed to be done.
Tom didn\'t have the heart to tell Mary what had happened to her dog.
Tom didn\'t have the time to do everything that Mary asked him to do.
Tom says he wants me to leave, but I don\'t think he really means it.
Tom started as a janitor, but he\'s now the president of the company.
Tom found an injured bird in the forest and nursed it back to health.
Tom got up on the wrong side of the bed and has been grouchy all day.
Tom had his wisdom teeth taken out by a twenty-four year old dentist.
Tom got to the station in time to catch the train he wanted to catch.
Maybe eventually you\'ll decide you don\'t want to live here anymore.
I wouldn\'t have believed that if I hadn\'t seen it with my own eyes.
I hate myself for not having the will power to quit eating junk food.
Wearing fluorescent yellow socks with black pants isn\'t a good look.
